subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Doping (Sports)
Bicycles and Bicycling
Giro d''Italia (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: The Texan's seven consecutive victories in the Tour de France, nearly all by robust margins, testify to his domination of a sordid decade for his sport.
snippet: The Texan's seven consecutive victories in the Tour de France, nearly all by robust margins, testify to his domination of a sordid decade for his sport.
